description: Provide seamless integration with blockchain APIs to empower your applications with real-time blockchain data and operations. Enable efficient access and manipulation of blockchain resources through standardized tools and protocols. Enhance your development workflow with ready-to-use blockchain context capabilities.

capabilities.name: list_nodit_api_categories
capabilities.description: Lists available Nodit API categories from Nodit Blockchain Context. To use the Nodit API tool, you must first call this tool.

capabilities.name: list_nodit_data_apis
capabilities.description: Lists available Nodit Data API operations.

capabilities.name: list_nodit_webhook_apis
capabilities.description: Lists available Nodit Webhook API operations.

capabilities.name: list_nodit_aptos_indexer_api_query_root
capabilities.description: Lists all query roots available in the Nodit Aptos Indexer GraphQL API.

capabilities.name: get_nodit_aptos_indexer_api_spec
capabilities.description: Returns the GraphQL specification for a specific query root in the Nodit Aptos Indexer API.

capabilities.name: call_nodit_aptos_indexer_api
capabilities.description: Calls a Nodit Aptos Indexer API. Returns the API response. Before making the call, it's recommended to verify the detailed API specifications using the 'get_nodit_aptos_indexer_api_spec' tool. Please note that using this tool will consume your API quota.

capabilities.name: get_nodit_api_spec
capabilities.description: Gets the fully resolved spec details for a Nodit Blockchain Context API operationId. Returns details as a JSON string.

capabilities.name: call_nodit_api
capabilities.description: This function calls a specific Nodit Blockchain Context API using its operationId. Before making the call, it's recommended to verify the detailed API specifications using the 'get_nodit_api_spec' tool. Please note that using this tool will consume your API quota.
